field.name: count
field.description: The number of results to return.

field.name: cursor
field.description: A cursor is a string (normally base64 encoded) which marks a specific item in a list of data. When cursor is present it should be used instead of "page".

field.name: status
field.description: The status a node must be in to match the search request.

field.name: statuses
field.description: A set of statuses (node must match at least one) to include in the search results.

field.name: fields_used
field.description: The fields that are being queried as determined by parsing the "q" field.
